name: Playpen
body:
# SMF 2.1 Staging and Testing Zone ... AKA
**The PlayPen**

***

This is where we have been trying out some early code, sharing ideas and changes before they get merged (or not) in to the [SimpleMachines Repo](https://github.com/organizations/SimpleMachines).  This allows everyone to have an early view of what is being worked on and provide some code ideas of their own.  

This repo will often have bugs and changes in direction as we move things along, hence the name playpen suits it well
tagline: Thoughts, Ideas and bits of code for SMF (2.1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
